Is it possible to use the `definecurrency` command through a web interface?

No, the `definecurrency` command is not accessible through a web interface. According to the examples provided, it can be used either through the Verus command-line interface (`verus definecurrency jsondefinition`) or through a JSON-RPC request using `curl` (`curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "definecurrency", "params": [jsondefinition] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/`).

Result:
{
 "txid" : "transactionid", (string) The transaction id
 "tx"  : "json",     (json)  The transaction decoded as a transaction
 "hex" : "data"      (string) Raw data for signed transaction
}

Examples:
> verus definecurrency jsondefinition
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "definecurrency", "params": [jsondefinition] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
